pr_title: Allow users to define Kafka Streams topic names

timeline.message: Allow users to define Kafka Streams topic names

timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't this be something like this:
 %dev.registry.streams.topology.storage.topic=${REGISTRY_STREAMS_TOPOLOGY_STORAGE_TOPIC:storage-topic}
timeline.author: EricWittmann

replies.bodyText:
Looks like env vars are picking up without to be explicitly redefined as described in #637 by @alesj
I tried with latest image build on top of master and https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry-demo and it was working with custom topic names
I can test it again, but looks like this should work
replies.author: dmvolod

replies.bodyText: OK maybe it's something Quarkus is doing by parsing the ENV variables.  I see the name of the env variable mirrors the property name.  Or maybe I'm missing something else.  But if it works and you've tested it, that's fine for now.  👍
replies.author: EricWittmann
